application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Submission of details of a noise assessment pursuant to condition 5; the sound insulation of the floor/ ceiling/ walls separating the commercial part(s) of the premises from dwellings pursuant to condition 6; enhanced sound insulation value DnT,w and L'nT,w of at least 5dB above the Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/ uses in adjoining dwellings pursuant to condition 7; external sound level emitted from plant/ machinery/equipment and mitigation measures pursuant to condition 8; anti-vibration measures pursuant to condition 9; Ventilation Strategy Report pursuant to condition 10 of planning permission ref: 2023/03180/FUL granted 4th June 2024.
